articles.title: Google’s Pixel Watch 3 and Anker’s two-headed USB-C cable are our favorite deals this week - The Verge
articles.description: The last-gen Google Pixel Watch 3, Microsoft’s Xbox Wireless Controller, and the Logitech Lift mouse are all discounted to their best price to date this weekend.
articles.content: We also found great deals on the foldable Motorola Razr (2024), the SteelSeries Arctis Pro Wireless headset, and more. We also found great deals on the foldable… [+6228 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Bluesky hits 40 million users, introduces ‘dislikes’ beta - TechCrunch
articles.description: As users "dislike" posts, the system will learn what sort of content they want to see less of. This will help to inform more than just how content is ranked in feeds, but also reply rankings.
articles.content:
Social network Bluesky, which on Friday announced a new milestone of 40 million users, will soon start testing “dislikes” as a way to improve personalization on its main Discover feed and others.
